thread.title: Comedy club seeks funds for Phyllis Diller exhibit in Ohio
thread.title_full: Comedy club seeks funds for Phyllis Diller exhibit in Ohio

title: Comedy club seeks funds for Phyllis Diller exhibit in Ohio
text:
Comedy club wants to honor comedian and native Ohioan Phyllis Diller with museum exhibit 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 7/12/15 6:59 pm EDT - Updated: 7/12/15 7:01 pm EDT 
LIMA, Ohio â€” A comedy club is trying to raise money to honor comedian Phyllis Diller with a museum exhibit in her northwest Ohio hometown. 
Limaland Comedy hosted the third annual Lima's Funniest Lady festival to help raise money for a permanent Phyllis Diller exhibit at the Allen County Museum. 
Diller spent her childhood in Lima. Gina Chiappazzi of Limaland Comedy tells The Lima News ( http://bit.ly/1NYxhCK ) that the comedian who died in 2012 is an inspiration to women because she was one of the first to break into the male-dominated profession. 
Allen County Museum director Patricia Smith says she would love to see a more elaborate Diller display at the museum. 
The museum's few Diller items include a dress, two paintings done by Diller and some publicity photos. 
Information from: The Lima News, http://www.limanews.com
